article_title: How Truman's Medicare Efforts Were Foiled By Red Baiting

article_metadata.description: In The Heart of Power, David Blumenthal and James Morone relate the 75 year history of presidential efforts (typically unsuccessful) to reform the U.S. healthcare system.  I used to think major reform efforts did not happen for many years after FDR’s New Deal.  After all, social security had taken a [...]
